welcome.messageWelcome:
This setup wizard guides you through the most important settings and gives you valuable tips for configuration.
Do you want to use your shop in a different language and reach customers in other countries? Then you can simply install the desired language packs here.
welcome.switchLanguageMessage: Your language plugin "{pluginName}" was installed successfully. Would you like to change your interface language?
welcome.pluginsInstalledMessage: Language Plugin has been installed: | These language Plugins have been installed:
welcome.pluginNotFoundMessage: The language Plugin for {languageName} could not be found.
welcome.noConnectionMessage: Connection Issue, the language could not be installed right now.

dataImport.messageDemoData: Start exploring Shopware 6 by adding a set of demo data. Demo data gives the impression of a fully working shop, but should strictly be used for testing purposes only.
dataImport.messageMigration: The Migration Assistant helps you to connect and transfer data from a previous shop system to your new Shopware 6 environment.
dataImport.loadingMessage:
Installing plugin
This may take a while...

mailerSelection.headline: Establishing email communication
mailerSelection.description: Communicating with customers is a key factor in everyday e-commerce. Consequently, setting up a mailing scheme should be crossed out from your list as soon as possible.
mailerSelection.localOptionHelptext: This option uses your systemâ€˜s default mailer (Sendmail).  Make sure Sendmail works and is available in your own hosting environment.
mailerSelection.configurationNote: Mailing configurations can be edited later.

paypalInfo.headline: Now pre-integrated in Shopware with even easier and faster activation of the most popular payment methods*
paypalInfo.disclaimerLineTwo: ** subject to a positive risk assessment by PayPal

paypalInstall.loadingMessage:
Configuring PayPal
This may take a while...

recommendedPlugins.headline: Our recommendations
recommendedPlugins.message: Here you will find a selection of useful extensions for your shop. First select a region that is relevant for you. Then you can browse through different categories.

shopwareAccount.headline: Shopware Account
shopwareAccount.message:
Sign up now with your Shopware ID. This will give you access to your purchased plugins and licenses.

With your Shopware ID you can log into other Shopware platforms such as the Community Store, the forum or your personal Shopware account.
shopwareAccount.registerAccountText: You don't have a Shopware ID yet? Then register directly

error.messageLoginDataInvalid: Login credentials incorrect, please try again.

shopwareDomain.headline: Verify your domain
shopwareDomain.message: With which domain do you want to link this shop? Select the appropriate domain or create a new one.

finish.loadingMessage:
Restarting application
This may take a while...
